Nick's Blog

V for Vendetta

18 March 2006

Rating: 5 of 5

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5

 

imdb: http://imdb.com/title/tt0434409/

Last night Carolyn and I caught a late showing of V for Vendetta at the metreon. I wasn't really sure if Carolyn would like it, but I had high hopes for it. After sitting through it I can honestly say that this is one of the best movies that I've seen all year. I was very impressed with the thoroughly developed plot and development of the characters. All around it was a really great movie.
